channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19964] Apply resource plan fails if trigger expression has quotes
item.description:
0: jdbc:hive2://localhost:10000> CREATE TRIGGER global.big_hdfs_read WHEN HDFS_BYTES_READ > '300kb' DO KILL;

item.summary: Apply resource plan fails if trigger expression has quotes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
